name: Arcanum Looter
description:
164th one hour game jam "your favorite game but the most simplest possible"

As I am a big fan of Arcanum I have decided to make a game in which you loot bins and create stuff out of found trash. Crafting part coming soon. :)

Character sprites by Klaudia - https://www.instagram.com/kfiatkova/

Time so far - 100 minutes with upload.
